QuestData.Title: A New Enemy
QuestData.Description: The power of these Dark Shaman has attracted many allies, $n. Former members of the Horde that now work towards some dark purpose.$b$bWe need to make an example of them before we have another twilight's hammer on our hands.$b$bKill any cultist you come across and bring me their insignia.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 5 Corrupted Insignia from any cultist in Ragefire Chasm.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $n. This will make it very clear how Garrosh is going to deal with failures...
